items.sentence: Tom is the one that\'s been stealing our sheep.
Why don\'t you come along with us to the party?
I didn\'t think that Tom would change his mind.
I didn\'t want anyone to know why I went there.
I didn\'t want to come here in the first place.
I didn\'t want to do that, but I had no choice.
I didn\'t want to leave without saying goodbye.
All brides are beautiful on their wedding days.
All the furniture in our house was made by Tom.
Do you really think that Tom is from Australia?
Do you think that Tom could do that by himself?
I have to lose weight, so I\'m going on a diet.
I haven\'t even thought about that possibility.
I haven\'t spoken with Tom since that happened.
I haven\'t worn this tie in almost three years.
My flight back to Boston leaves in three hours.
My girlfriend sometimes flirts with other boys.
My parents gave me a house when we got married.
My sister has been knitting since this morning.
My three-year-old niece kissed me on the cheek.
